1.name: The Cihuateteo
1.description: A female aztec ghost warrior, who has died from childbirth.

2.name: Centzon Totochtin
2.description: One of a group of aggressive mystical rabbit.

3.description: A pale dog sized amphibian with gills.

4.description: A pale porsche sized amphibian with gills.

5.name: Yahui
5.description: A giant reptillian creature with a turtle shell andflint claws.

6.name: Ceyuatl
6.description: A giant frog with a small stone knife.

7.name: Mega axolotl
7.description: A bus sized amphibian with gills.

8.name: Ahuizotl
8.description: A dog like creature with an additional hand for a tail.

9.name: Teuzauhtototl
9.description: An owl that calls of death.
